color_extracterÂ¶

Functionality Extracts the dominant color palette from an image and visualizes it.

Input - Path setup: Provide the image file path (image_path).

Example: image_path = './path/to/image.jpg'

  • Optional parameters: - n_colors: Number of dominant colors to extract (default is 5).

Output - Return value:

  • extract_color_palette: Returns a list of RGB tuples for the extracted colors. Example: [(255, 0, 0), (0, 255, 0), (0, 0, 255)]

  • Visualization: - plot_palette: Displays the extracted colors as a horizontal bar chart using Matplotlib.

imgPreprocessor
